title: Behaviorally oriented therapists seek to modify

content.question: Behaviorally oriented therapists seek to modify a client's behavior by

choices.label: relating past events to the client's current behavior
removing the underlying causes of the client's behavioral problems
changing the contingencies of reinforcement for the client

content.answer: changing the contingencies of reinforcement for the client

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
